name: Flight Simulator 2019: Pilot
description:
FLIGHT SIMULATOR 2019: PILOT
Putting gamers in the cockpit of the most advanced flight simulator ever developed, this game delivers the most comprehensive flight simulation experience ever created through photorealistic visuals, intense action, a multitude of authentic and futuristic aircraft to travel, and even an immersive storyline! Feel the Rush of Superior Air Power

Soar in any part of the world and explore landscapes, airports, aircraft carriers in high resolution with radar maps, 3D buildings, runways, and procedures. Unleash your inner maverick, become a flight pilot & fly across the globe to conquer the skies! Aerial piloting has never looked or felt better!

Features
+ Innovation In The Sky: Breathtaking clouds coupled with highly detailed aircraft and photorealistic scenery make this the most engaging flight simulator to date.
+ Multiple sectors featuring high definition satellite imagery, detailed topography and all major airports with precise runway and taxiway layouts
+ Tons of real-life planes: from Airbus & Boeing to Learjet & Supersonic Jets, from airliners to military aircraft.
+ Fun and challenging missions: emergencies, rescue missions, rough landings, transport and even more.
+ Immersive scenario: explore a huge open-world map with beautifully rendered cloudy skies and highly detailed cityscapes enhance the sense of unparalleled speed and set the stage for the most engaging aerial experience.
+ Intuitive mobile controls (tilt, buttons, and joystick) and addicting gameplay that provide unprecedented immersion.
+ Play it anywhere: Flight Simulator 2019: Pilot does not require any internet connection.

Download the best Flight Simulator on App Store for free now! Take to the skies with Flight simulator 2019: Pilot and enjoy global missions and grand adventures around the world. fun is absolutely guaranteed!
